name: Sound game training
description:
I can't do a full combo...
I want to improve my score...
I can't get the All Perfect...
If you're like that, you need to train!

This app specializes in training sound games using video.
You can do the things you need to do to improve your score: memorize the chart, memorize the rhythm, and think about how to move your fingers.

For example, you can do the following for training.
• Play the video you played at 'low speed' to see where you missed
• Play full combo videos uploaded by others to YouTube and learn the rhythm by touching the judgment line

It's a video, so you can play it over and over again to check it out. Try to calm down and check the difficult parts one by one.
Keep practicing the videos "at low speed" and "only the difficult parts over and over again" and you'll be able to improve your skills!

______________________________

MAIN FUNCTIONS
• Play the video in "Camera roll", "iCloud Drive", "Transfer from iTunes", "YouTube".
• Touching the screen while playing a video does not pause it.
• Adjust the start/end position of video playback.
• Enlarge or shrink the video.
• Adjusting video playback position.
• Adjust the video playback speed between 0.25 and 2.00 times.
• Specify a range of video playback.
• Flip the video left to right.
• Supports video orientation in portrait and landscape.
• Display the tap position line for some apps.
• Easily rewind and fast forward during playback.

What this app doesn't have
• Playing videos are not included in the app.
